nodes.text: Navari Trik was a distributor of paintings.
During 1 ABY, she was tasked with distributing paintings selected in Galactic Empire Painting Contest, as well as secretly distributing Rebel paintings from the Rebel Alliance Painting Contest.

She set up shop near the Mos Eisley Cantina for a short time, distributing paintings to a number of spacers. Two paintings of note that she distributed were, United in our Cause and The March to Restuss.
She later made a return, distributing two other paintings titled Imperial Oasis Incident and Preparing for the Storm in front of the Mos Eisley Spaceport.

Navari Trik was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. During Game Update 5, players could obtain paintings from her in Mos Eisley. These paintings were created by players and voted on by the playerbase.

She once again made another appearance during Game Update 14, handing out two others free of charge. Just like before, these two paintings were created by players, and voted on by the playerbase on the Star Wars Galaxies message board.
